message:
#Javascript #Algorithms 
How to check for "Valid Parentheses" in just 8 lines of code :) !
**LeetCode Spoiler**
Given a string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.

The brackets must close in the correct order, "()" and "()[]{}" are all valid but "(]" and "([)]" are not.
.
.

Balanced parenthesis check can be done using stack implementation
http://codereview.stackexchange.com/questions/45991/balanced-parentheses
the 8 line of code that leads to more than O(n^3) complexity

This is a famous stack based problem , this is my solution in c ++
